Name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
Note: Served under the name of Lew Alcindor for two seasons before becoming Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

Name: Malik Sealy
Note: Died in a car crash while playing for the team. His jersey was retired posthumously.

Name: Pete Maravich
Note: Never played for the franchise. He played for the New Orleans Jazz (now the Utah Jazz) from 1974–1979.

Name: Bobby Phills
Note: Died in a car crash while playing for the team; with the team when it was in Charlotte. His jersey was retired posthumously.

Name: Dick McGuire
Note: Also served as head coach (1965–1968) and scouting director.
